LANG_CHOOSE_GROUP_ADVICE: You are trying to change your language(not group)? Do that using /start in private chat
LANG_CHANGED: Ok, from now i will speak english 🇬🇧
NEW_GROUP: Thanks for adding me to your group! • Don't forget to make me Admin of the group (see how), or i cant work correctly • Use /reload to verify that's all ok
PRESENTATION: 👋🏻 Hello {name}! @LibreGroupHelpBot is the free, open source and privacy respecting Bot alternative to Group Help to better manage your groups! 👉🏻Add me in a supergroup and set me as an Administrator to get me right into the action! ❓ What are the commands? Press /help to see all commands and how they work!
INFO: Libre Group Help runs under Nodejs and is an Open Source project that aims to offer a relaiable bot to manage your groups and be privacy respecting to it's users Bot version: {LGHVersion} Bot staff •@Sp3rick_hj, creator and first developer
SUPPORT_MESSAGE: 👉🏻 Send now a message with a request to the Staff. 💡The request has to be sent in one message only, other messages will be not received.
SUPPORT_SENT_CONFIRM: Message sent. We will reply as soon as possible.
SUPPORT_RECEIVED: 👤You received a message from the support, to respond reply this message
SETTINGS_WHERE_OPEN: Where do you want to open the settings menu?
SETTINGS_SELECT: Select one of the settings you want edit.
SETUP_GUIDE: In order to set me up, use /settings or press the underlying button.
